entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make NamingStylePreferences messagepack serializable #60849
  • Stack Trace Explorer should have middle click to close tab #60848
  • We are creating in-proc compilations for OOP analysis when full-solution analysis is on #60843
    17.3
  • Make Generate parameter refactoring aware of CancellationToken convention #60842
    Backlog
  • Copy pasting code is bringing in using namespace though not required #60841
    17.3
  • "Speculative" keywords (discard, field) binding + private symbols in base type #60836
  • Convert to interpolated string refactoring is not available in VB when an implicit conversion is used #60835
    Backlog
  • C# 10 nullable type "?" character display seems inconsistent in the Intellisense display of the XML documentation #60833
    17.3
  • GoToDefinitionOpensProvisionalTabIfDocumentNotAlreadyOpen failed with "cannot navigate to symbol" #60831
    17.3

Closed

  • Refactor local function from lambda #60701
    17.3
  • Generic completions should add `<>` and put cursor between them #60751
    Backlog
  • Improve `nameof` completion #60669

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #60850
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Fix the color key for rename hint text at the bottom #60847
    Area-IDE
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure idle-processing (like solution syncing) does not execute while paused due to global operations (like msbuild compiles) #60845
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #60844
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove deprecated NuPkg projects #60839
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cherry-pick 60493 to 17.2 #60832
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Avoid artificial tagging delay when called by consumer that is explicitly blocking for results. #60830
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude System.Text.Encoding.CodePages from OptProf #60827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TypeScript code actions and Xaml remove unused usings #60829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Convert Visual Basic error list tests to the new framework #60588
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add OptProf.json to CI excluded files #60828
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Revert "Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string (#60227)" #60851
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply 'require accessibility modifiers' setting on interface methods #60226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Use solution filter instead of multiple solutions #47531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
